home.title: JalSuraksha
home.description: Upload groundwater test data or enter values manually to calculate pollution indices and assess environmental risks
home.step1Desc: Provide groundwater test results via file upload or manual entry
home.step2Desc: System computes HPI, HEI, Cd, and EF values
home.step3Desc: See detailed analysis with safety classifications
home.step4Desc: Interactive charts and maps for better understanding
